Plan: The issue is likely that the initial video in `ContentFeedViewModel` is prepared but not explicitly played when the content is first loaded. The `updateActiveVideo` function is called when `currentIndex` changes, but not on initial load. We can modify the `loadContent` in the `ContentFeedViewModel` function to call `activatePlayerAsync` with the first video URL *after* the content is loaded, ensuring the player is ready. The logic to avoid playing twice will already be handled by the `activatePlayerAsync` method in the `VideoPlayerManager`, so there is no need for extra checks in the view model.

change.description: Modify loadContent to play first video
